content: to lift the pillowcase out of the washer to check the scarf be careful the water is very hot if your scarf has not fully felted by the time your wash cycle has ended turn back the cycle before it drains the tub and then let it run again never let the washer reach the spin cycle it can mangle your work when you are satisfied with the look of your scarf remove it from the washer and roll it into a towel or two gently squeeze as much water as you can from the scarf unroll the towel and lay the scarf out flat and untwisted on another two towels to dry depending on the humidity where you live it will take at least a
